title: quarkus-swagger-ui logo.png not loaded
body:
### Describe the bug

logo.png not loaded by io.quarkus:quarkus-swagger-ui into swagger ui docs

### Expected behavior

In the docs it is stated:

> Logo
To supply your own logo, you need to place a file called logo.png in src/main/resources/META-INF/branding.

See https://quarkus.io/guides/openapi-swaggerui#logo
I did so
![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/19996713/328c62a6-eb71-4a93-aedb-9f3962312664)
So I expect that image to be reflected in swagger ui.


### Actual behavior

![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/19996713/71e9fa34-126d-4058-9905-edebef978cca)
![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/19996713/fb22a408-2ea1-404f-83db-b020fe685cee)
It is not loaded tho

### How to Reproduce?

Using a static open api file 
![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/19996713/59d144d3-e011-4a59-8ab8-5a292bc82407)

application.properties content:

quarkus.swagger-ui.always-include=true
quarkus.swagger-ui.path=docs

mp.openapi.scan.disable=true
quarkus.smallrye-openapi.info-title=Open Api for car insurance api

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

21.0.2

### Quarkus version or git rev

quarkusPlatformVersion=3.8.2

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

Tested that `quarkus.swagger-ui.path` makes no difference.
